name: Hollow Grotto
description:
Your mission  is to find and repair broken mining robots dispersed all around underground. To achieve your goal, you have the ability to dig through rock walls with your mechanical suit or you can swing around with a grappling that pulls you where you aim. But be careful, because you are not alone in this cave, something is lurking around...

Every time you start a new mission, the cavern and the spawn position of the objectives are generated randomly. There is no end to the mission, just to survive  and repair the most robots in one run.

This game is based on the marching cube algorithm, that allows to destroy the terrain in every direction.

It was a school project, and was not intended to be visually appealling. It was more of programming task that an artististic one.
